infos.name: Action Badge - Weihnachten, Silvester, Oster, Valentinstag
infos.description:
Action Badge - Mehr Aufmerksamkeit für Ihre Verkaufsaktionen!

Die App fügt einen animierten Störer an der rechten Seite des Browserfensters ein. Per Springfeder-Animation wird ein frei wählbares Bild einblendet. Klickt der Besucher den Störer an, gelangt er zu dem Linkziel welches Sie in der App-Konfiguration festgelegt haben. Der Störer wird danach nicht wieder angezeigt. Die Zeit bis zur Einblendung kann ebenfalls in der App-Konfiguration eingestellt werden.


Dokumentation

https://brainstation-docs.gitbook.io/shopware/shopware-6-apps/action-badge


Beispiel Störer zur freien Verwendung in Ihrem Shopware Shop

Finden Sie in der Feature-Liste. Rechtsklick + Bild speichern unter.
Mit Liebe zum Design by brainstation. Kein copyright. Viel Spaß beim Verwenden ;)


Sind Sie zufrieden mit unserer App und unserem Service? Dann bewerten Sie die App in Ihrem Shopware Account. Damit unterstützen Sie uns, auch in Zukunft weitere Apps zu entwickeln. Vielen Dank ;)
infos.installationManual:
• Schritt 1: Installation der App über den App-Manager.
  • Schritt 2: App über die Konfiguration aktivieren und konfigurieren.
  • Schritt 3: Nach dem Speichern Cache leeren und Theme neu kompilieren.


Sie finden eine detaillierte Beschreibung in unserer Bedienungsanleitung:

https://brainstation-docs.gitbook.io/shopware/shopware-6-apps/action-badge

infos.name: Action Badge - Christmas, New Year, Easter, Valentines day
infos.description:
Action Badge - More attention for your sales promotions!

The app inserts an animated disturber on the right side of the browser window. A free selectable image is faded in via spring-feather animation. If the visitor clicks on the disturber, he attends to the link target which you defined in the plugin configuration. The disturber will not be displayed again afterwards. The time to fade in can also be set in the app configuration.


Documentation

https://brainstation-docs.gitbook.io/shopware/shopware-6-apps/action-badge


Example disturber for free use in your Shopware Shop

Find free grafics in the feature list below. Right click + save image.
With love for design by brainstation. No copyright. Have fun using it;)


Are you satisfied with our app and our service? Then rate the app in your Shopware account. With this you support us to develop further apps in the future. Many Thanks ;)
infos.installationManual:
• Step 1: Installation of app through app manager
  • Step 2: Activate and configure it in the app configuration.
  • Step 3: Clear the cache and rebuild your theme in the theme manager.


You will find a detailed description in our operating instructions: (currently only german)

https://brainstation-docs.gitbook.io/shopware/shopware-6-apps/action-badge
infos.shortDescription: The app inserts an animated disturber on the right side of the browser window. A free selectable image is faded in via spring-feather animation which can be linked.
infos.highlights:
Very prominent representation for the customer
Spring animation
Versatile use by freely selectable graphics and linking
Applicable z. B. for Christmas, Easter, Valentine's Day, New Year's Eve

changelog.text: Troubleshooting "Show badge only for these categories" processing. Compatibility for newer Shopware versions
Integration of date and time related display
Fix Installation issue with Shopware Version 6.3.5.#
Image selection in the plugin configuration was hidden. The selection has now been moved to the last position to avoid this.
If the plugin was installed but not yet configured, there were errors in the frontend. This version fixes the problem.
Bugfixing the badge display if it was deactivated by the customer.
